historySnippet.reasoning: A is already فوق 0.75 but is slightly fading while D is collapsing, so I’ll keep U near the best-record 0.10 and reduce diversity loss (k_D_decay) plus slightly boost diversity->complexity coupling (k_CD) to stabilize D without adding selection pressure; this is safer than a phase-shift given we’re near peak A and past small k_A_decay tweaks have been mixed.

Agency is already safely above 0.75 but is slightly fading (dA/dt<0) alongside decaying complexity (dC/dt<0), so we keep U at the proven best (0.10) and counter the drift by reducing decay terms (k_C_decay, k_A_decay) while slightly lowering k_D_decay to preserve high D that feeds C (noting past A gains from lowering k_C_decay at Gen 1213.2 and improving A via k_A_decay tuning around Gen 860.3).

Agency is already far above the 0.75 objective and still rising, but Diversity is actively collapsing (dD/dt=-0.0068) so I’ll keep U at the proven-best 0.10 while reducing k_D_decay toward the best-record setting to stabilize D without sacrificing A (history shows k_D_decay tweaks can move A and we want to avoid a future diversity crash).

A is already >0.75 but D is starting to collapse (dD/dt=-0.0022), so I’ll keep U at the best-record level while slightly reducing diversity decay to stabilize D and prevent future C/A erosion (consistent with earlier gains from tuning k_D_decay).

Agency is already safely above 0.75 and still rising, but Diversity is currently collapsing (dD/dt=-0.0058), so I’ll keep U at the best-record level while easing intrinsic diversity decay to stabilize D without sacrificing A (consistent with prior D-decay tweaks yielding gains).

Agency is already maxed (A=1.0) but drifting down with dA/dt<0 while C is decaying, so we keep U at the proven best (0.10) and counter the slide by slightly reducing k_C_decay and k_A_decay to stabilize C and sustain A without harming high D (history shows lowering k_C_decay previously improved A).

Agency is already maxed but dD/dt is strongly negative, so I’ll run a short “diversity rebuild” phase by dropping U while also reducing k_D_decay to arrest the collapse (history shows k_D_decay tweaks can help without harming A much).

Agency is already safely >0.75 and near the best record; since the best A=1.0 occurred at U=0.10 and recent tweaks to k_D_decay/k_A_decay have been noisy (sometimes hurting A), I’ll revert toward the best-challenge U while keeping current stabilizing params to avoid destabilizing C/D.

Agency is already safely >0.75 and still rising, but Diversity is starting to collapse (dD/dt=-0.0102), so I’ll keep U at the best-record value while reducing diversity decay pressure (lower k_D_decay) and slightly boosting intrinsic diversity regeneration (raise k_D_growth) to prevent a future diversity crash that could later undermine C and A.

Agency is already safely above 0.75 and slightly rising while Complexity is slowly decaying, so I’ll keep U at the best-record level (0.10) and make a small stabilizing tweak by reducing complexity decay (noting past k_C_decay reductions improved A) to prevent C erosion from eventually dragging A down.

name: Diversity-Damped Agency Weaver
description: This agent crossed the threshold by tightly coupling agency to environmental difficulty (k_AU=0.99) while keeping internal state noise low (sigma_A=0.005, sigma_C=0.005), allowing it to hold near-max agency even under U=0.10. Its emergence was not a smooth climb: repeated tuning of diversity decay (k_D_decay) produced oscillations in agency until the late-stage adjustment pairing higher diversity growth with controlled decay (Gen 1635.4) restored resilience after the difficulty increase (Gen 1597.8), enabling a stable, high-complexity/high-diversity operating point (C=0.916, D=0.991) at A=0.994.
